<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Data.Finite.Basic | 453 | 0 | -453 (-100.00%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Set.Finite | 490 | 489 | -1 (-0.20%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fin.Tuple.BubbleSortInduction | 523 | 522 | -1 (-0.19%) |
| Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Limits.FintypeCat | 578 | 577 | -1 (-0.17%) |
| Mathlib.GroupTheory.GroupAction.Quotient | 704 | 703 | -1 (-0.14%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.ConjFinite | 736 | 735 | -1 (-0.14%) |
| Mathlib.GroupTheory.Abelianization | 801 | 800 | -1 (-0.12%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 3237 files with changed transitive imports taking up over 140072 characters: this is too many to display!
You can run `scripts/import_trans_difference.sh all` locally to see the whole output.

</details>

</details>

---

./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

```

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
